subject: Death and Dying
Baseball
Teenagers and Adolescence
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Thomas Adams, 16, who was wearing all his catching gear, including a chest protector, was hit by a pitched ball about 7 p.m. and went into cardiac arrest.
snippet: Thomas Adams, 16, who was wearing all his catching gear, including a chest protector, was hit by a pitched ball about 7 p.m. and went into cardiac arrest.
